casebody.data:
Thomas W. HILL,
v.
Garford Tony HILL, Jewel Anne Hill, D. Samuel Neill, Boyd B. Massagee, Jr., M.M. Hunt, J.P. Hunt, Barbara Hill Garrison, William Lloyd Garrison, Ervin W. Bazzle, Cincinnati Insurance Co., and Estate of Sadie C. Hill. No. 638P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2008. Thomas W. Hill, Pro Se. W. Scott Jones, Asheville, for Garford Tony Hill, et al. Prior report: 173 N.C.App. 309 , 622 S.E.2d 503 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 29th day of January 2008 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th day of January 2008."

MARTIN and TIMMONS-GOODSON, JJ., recused.
